meanings.definition: A spicy condiment or sauce typically made from chili peppers, shrimp paste, fish sauce, garlic, ginger, sugar, and lime juice.
meanings.sent1: I love adding sambal to my noodles for an extra kick of spice.
meanings.sent2: The sambal gave the dish a delicious heat that complemented the flavors perfectly.
meanings.sent3: My friend thought sambal was too spicy until they tried it with their fries!
meanings.sent4: The sambal was a fiery dragon breathing flavor into the bland soup.
meanings.sent5: The sambal danced on my taste buds, leaving a trail of warmth and flavor.

meanings.definition: To season or flavor with sambal.
meanings.sent1: I sambal my stir-fry to make it more exciting.
meanings.sent2: She sambals her grilled chicken to give it a unique taste.
meanings.sent3: The chef sambaled the dish, creating a burst of flavors on the plate.
meanings.sent4: Sambaling the soup turned it into a spicy masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: When you sambal your food, it becomes a flavor adventure in every bite.
